definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Father and Son have power to raise people from the dead.
sentences.chinese: 父与子有使人死里复活的大能。

sentences.english: For though he was crucified through weakness, yet he liveth by the power of God.
sentences.chinese: 他因软弱被钉在十字架上，却因神的大能，仍然活着。

sentences.english: One generation will commend your works to another; they will tell of your mighty acts.
sentences.chinese: 这代要对那代颂赞你的作为，也要传扬你的大能。

sentences.english: Nehemiah knew that one plus prayer equals the mighty power of God.
sentences.chinese: 尼希米深深明白，一，加上祷告，等于神的大能。

sentences.english: You turn on me ruthlessly ; with the might of your hand you attack me.
sentences.chinese: 你向我变心，待我残忍，又用大能追逼我。

sentences.english: For the gospel is the power of God for salvation to everyone who believes.
sentences.chinese: 这福音本是神的大能，要救一切相信的。

sentences.english: And Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his father's house twenty and two captains.
sentences.chinese: 还有少年大能的勇士撒督，同着他的有族长二十二人。

sentences.english: And those He calls, He also enable and equips by His strength, power, and might.
sentences.chinese: 而祂所呼召的人，祂也会以祂的大能大力来装备他们。

sentences.english: And next to him was Jehohanan the captain, and with him two hundred and fourscore thousand.
sentences.chinese: 其次是，千夫长约哈难率领大能的勇士二十八万。

sentences.english: Zadok, a young man mighty in valor, and twenty-two commanders from his own fathers' house.
sentences.chinese: 还有少年大能的勇士撒督，同著他的有族长二十二人。

sentences.english: The Lord is with you, great soldier.
sentences.chinese: 大能的勇士阿，耶和华神与你同在。

sentences.english: It is but one aspect of that mighty power of God which works in the heart of His believing people.
sentences.chinese: 代祷乃是神的大能，在信祂的人心中工作的一个凭藉。

sentences.english: Who will deliver us from the hand of these mighty gods?
sentences.chinese: 谁能救我们脱离这些大能之神的手呢？

sentences.english: Elijah had seen the power of God in ways that few human beings have ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 伊莱贾曾经以少有的人能经历的方式目睹神的大能。

sentences.english: Experience the might of those who reside in Valhalla's great halls.
sentences.chinese: 体验一下瓦尔哈拉伟大会堂中人的大能。

sentences.english: And in Malachi, He is the Son of Righteousness with healing in His wings.
sentences.chinese: 在玛拉基书，祂是公义的日头，发出医治的大能。

definition: Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
